scripts.dev: npm run kill && npm run clear-logs && sleep 1 && npx next dev -p 3009
scripts.dev-bg: npm run kill && npm run clear-logs && sleep 1 && nohup npx next dev -p 3009 > degenduel.log 2>&1 &
scripts.start: npm run kill && npm run clear-logs && sleep 1 && npx next start -p 3009
scripts.start-bg: npm run kill && npm run clear-logs && sleep 1 && nohup npx next start -p 3009 > degenduel.log 2>&1 &
scripts.deploy: npm run kill && npm run clear-logs && sleep 1 && npx next build && npx next start -p 3009
scripts.deploy-bg: npm run kill && npm run clear-logs && sleep 1 && nohup bash -c 'npx next build && npx next start -p 3009' > degenduel.log 2>&1 &
scripts.status: echo '=== LOG STATUS ===' && grep 'Ready' degenduel.log && echo '=== PORT STATUS ===' && echo '3009: ' && (fuser 3009/tcp && echo 'IN USE') || echo 'FREE'
